if you're lucky, it will have an entry in the gdm startup list, if you are unlucky you'll have to make a ~/.xsession file or hack a file in /usr/share/xsessions or similar

the simplest ~/.xsession would be a file containing the words " exec enlightenment "
then you would choose "default" for your E session
